content: k2 repeat to end of round round 10 p1 k2 c2f c2f p1 k to end repeat round 1 until you have 2 of ribbing approx 12 round 11 *k2 k2tog* repeat ** to end of round 24 sts rnds total round 12 *k1 k2tog* repeat ** to end of round 16 sts switch to larger needle round 13 *k2tog* repeat ** to end of round 8 sts set up round p2 k13 m1l k1 p2 k to end 73 sts finishing main pattern cut yarn leaving a 6 tail pull through remaining 8 sts round 1 p2 k15 p2 k to end and pull tight close hole weave in ends and add a pom pom to top of hat round 2 p2 k3 c6f c6f p2 k to end rnds 3 to 5 as round 1 round 6 p2 c6b c6b k3 p2 k to end round 7 to 9 as round 1 round 10 as round 2 rnds 11 to 13 as round 1 round 14 as round 6 rnds 15 & 16 as round 1 rnds 17 to 32 repeat rnds 1 to 16 once more decrease section note switch to dpn s or long circular needle for magic loop when sts no longer fit comfortably on the 16 needle round 1 p2tog k15 p2tog *k7 k2tog* repeat ** to end of round 65 sts round 2 p1 k3 c6f c6f p1 k to end round 3 p1 k2tog k4 k2tog k5 k2tog p1 *k6 k2tog* repeat ** to end of round 56 sts round 4 p1 k12 p1 k to end round 5 p1 k3 k2tog k3 k2tog k2 p1 *k5 k2tog* re- peat ** to end of round 48 sts round 6 p1 c4b c4b k2 p1 k to end round 7 p1 k1 k2tog k2 k2tog k3 p1 *k4 k2tog* re- peat ** to end of round 40 sts round 8 p1 k8 p1 k to end ©2022 yarn twisters 3 cable all the way
